title: I sent in my phone a pixel 4xl. I have a code to order a new phone. The pixel 4xl is out of stock.
content:
I sent in pixel 4xl.  I'm suppose to order a phone through the google store.   Pixel 4xl is out of stock.   It defaults to ordering a pixel 3xl.  I already have a 3xl.
What options do I have?
I just want a pixel 4xl like I had. 
Thanks for any info.
